ground_truth: They sit with the windscreen wipers and headlights still on. He gets out of the car and walks towards a taxi from which an elderly Chinese man is emerging accompanied by a young man holding an umbrella. In the restaurant, the young man brings a cup to the old man. The old man and Klaatu sit facing each other. Helen and his grandson are at another table. She stares at him. Helen looks at the men, then lowers her eyes. Klaatu studies the old man expressionlessly. High metal panels are pushed into place forming a triangular wall around the robot. A lid is dropped in place on top. The Colonel grins nervously. Police cars speed down a street at night. Helen is driving towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a wooded area, Klaatu gets out of the car. Jacob stares after him. Baffled, he looks out of the window. Watched by Jacob, she walks off following Klaatu. It's pitch-black. She moves slowly through the darkness. She cowers, covering her head, as insects swarm around her. She comes to a pond. The surface of the water begins to bubble and light shines up from beneath the surface. Hiding behind a tree, she watches as a sphere about 10 feet high rises to the surface of the pond. Lights and dark mists swirl within it. Fish and other animals are attracted to it. A frog and a lizard leap into the water heading towards it. It drifts towards the edge of the pond. Klaatu approaches it. Light flares beneath his hand and ripples across the surface as he touches it. Choppers circle the sphere in Central Park. Another sphere sits in the middle of a desert. A burst of light shoots across the surface. Desert creatures, scorpions and snakes, make their way towards it. A similar burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle. A fishing boat sits on a calm sea. Behind it, a vast sphere similar to the one in New York breaks the surface. Klaatu stares into the pond sphere. Helen watches from a distance as he concentrates, his hand resting on the sphere's surface. She makes her way back to the car. She gets into the driver's seat and sits looking stunned. She stares straight ahead. Video footage shows people milling around a sphere in South America. A screen shows a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower, making the surface transparent. Creatures squirm inside. Helen and Jacob wait in the car in the woods. She gets out of the car and follows the boy as he heads into the darkness. They're bathed in a brilliant light. Both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool, blazing with white light, rises slowly into the air.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: They perch with the windscreen wipers and headlights still activated. He exits the vehicle and strides towards a cab from which an aged Chinese gentleman is emerging accompanied by a youthful lad holding a parasol. In the eatery, the young man brings a mug to the elderly gentleman. The old man and Klaatu perch facing each other. Helen and his grandson are at another table. She glares at him. test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: They remain seated in the car, with the windscreen wipers and headlights still switched on, creating a rhythmic sound and a bright glow in the dim surroundings. He exits the vehicle and strides purposefully towards a nearby taxi, from which an elderly Chinese man is slowly emerging, accompanied by a young man who is carefully holding an umbrella to shield him from the elements. Inside the cozy restaurant, the young man attentively brings a steaming cup to the old man. The old man and Klaatu sit directly across from each other, their eyes meeting. Meanwhile, Helen and his grandson are seated at a separate table. She gazes intently at him, her eyes fixed. Helen observes the men for a moment, then lowers her eyes thoughtfully. Klaatu, with an expressionless face, studies the old man intently. High metal panels are methodically pushed into place, forming a triangular wall that encloses the robot. A lid is carefully dropped into place on top, sealing it. The Colonel grins nervously, a hint of tension in his smile. Police cars race down a street under the cover of night. Helen is driving with determination towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a secluded wooded area, Klaatu steps out of the car. Jacob watches him intently, his eyes following Klaatu's every move. Baffled and curious, he looks out of the window. Under Jacob's watchful gaze, she steps out and follows Klaatu into the darkness. It's pitch-black, and she moves cautiously through the enveloping darkness. She cowers, instinctively covering her head, as a swarm of insects buzzes around her. She eventually arrives at a pond. The surface of the water begins to bubble, and a mysterious light shines up from beneath the surface. Hiding behind a tree, she watches in awe as a sphere, approximately 10 feet high, rises majestically to the surface of the pond. Lights and dark mists swirl mesmerizingly within it. Fish and other animals are irresistibly drawn to it. A frog and a lizard leap eagerly into the water, heading towards the sphere. It drifts slowly towards the edge of the pond. Klaatu approaches it with a sense of purpose. Light flares beneath his hand and ripples gracefully across the surface as he touches it. Choppers circle the sphere in Central Park, their blades slicing through the air. Another sphere sits prominently in the middle of a vast desert. A burst of light shoots dramatically across its surface. Desert creatures, including scorpions and snakes, make their way towards it, drawn by its allure. A similar burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere nestled in a dense jungle. A fishing boat sits serenely on a calm sea. Behind it, a vast sphere, similar to the one in New York, breaks the surface of the water. Klaatu gazes intently into the pond sphere. Helen watches from a distance as he concentrates deeply, his hand resting gently on the sphere's surface. She makes her way back to the car, her mind racing. She gets into the driver's seat and sits there, looking utterly stunned. She stares straight ahead, lost in thought. Video footage shows people milling around a sphere in South America, their curiosity evident. A screen displays a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower, causing the surface to become transparent. Creatures squirm inside, visible through the now-clear surface. Helen and Jacob wait patiently in the car in the woods. She gets out of the car and follows the boy as he ventures into the darkness. They are suddenly bathed in a brilliant, blinding light. Both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool, now blazing with intense white light, rises slowly and majestically into the air.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Seated comfortably within the confines of the car, they remain as the rhythmic swish of the windscreen wipers and the brilliant glow of the headlights continue to break through the dim, murky surroundings. With a sense of determination, he exits the vehicle and purposefully strides over to a nearby taxi. From this vehicle, an elderly Chinese man is gradually emerging, moving slowly as he is accompanied by a young man who diligently holds an umbrella over him, offering shelter from the elements outside. Within the warm and inviting atmosphere of a cozy restaurant, the young man attentively serves the old man, bringing a steaming cup of tea to him. The old man and Klaatu find themselves seated directly across from one another, their eyes locking in silent communication. Meanwhile, Helen is at a separate table with the old man's grandson, her gaze fixed intently on the child. She observes the men momentarily, then lowers her eyes, lost in thought. Klaatu appears stoic and expressionless, yet his eyes intently study the old man. Methodically, high metal panels are pushed into place, forming a complex triangular wall that effectively encloses the robot. A lid is then carefully set into position atop the structure, sealing it off completely. The Colonel stands nearby with a grin that betrays a hint of nervousness, a subtle tension evident in his smile. Police cars speed down a street under the cloak of night. Determination written across her face, Helen drives determinedly towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a secluded, wooded area, Klaatu steps out of the car, his movements deliberate. Jacob, watching closely, doesn't miss a single move Klaatu makes, his curiosity piqued. His eyes cast out of the window, filled with a mix of bafflement and intrigue. Under Jacob's watchful gaze, she follows Klaatu into the darkness that envelops them. It is pitch-black as she moves cautiously through the inky shadows. She instinctively cowers, covering her head as a swarm of insects buzzes menacingly around her. Eventually, she arrives at a tranquil pond. The surface of the water begins to bubble mysteriously, and a strange light glows from beneath. Concealed behind a tree, she observes in awe as a gigantic sphere, towering approximately 10 feet high, rises magnificently to the surface of the pond. Lights and dark, swirling mists create a mesmerizing display within it. The surrounding fish and other creatures are irresistibly drawn toward the sphere. A frog and a lizard energetically leap into the water, making their way eagerly toward this captivating orb. It drifts gradually toward the pond's edge. Klaatu approaches with a clear sense of purpose. As he touches the surface, light flares beneath his hand and ripples gracefully across it. Helicopters circle above a sphere situated in Central Park, their blades slicing sharply through the air. Another sphere is prominently displayed in the heart of a vast desert. A dramatic burst of light suddenly shoots across its surface. Desert creatures, including scorpions and snakes, are drawn toward its magnetic allure, inching closer. In a dense jungle, a similar burst of light spreads over the surface of another sphere nestled within the lush foliage. Meanwhile, a fishing boat rests peacefully on a calm sea. Behind it, a similar vast sphere to the one seen in New York rises majestically from beneath the water's surface. Klaatu gazes deeply into the sphere within the pond, his concentration evident. Observing from a distance, Helen regards Klaatu with a mix of curiosity and wonder as he focuses intently, his hand gently resting on the sphere's surface. She eventually makes her way back to the car, her mind racing with the events she has witnessed. Settling into the driver's seat, she seems utterly stunned, staring straight ahead, lost in thought. Video footage captures people milling curiously around a sphere in South America, their inquisitiveness clearly visible. A screen displays a scene where a sphere is being subjected to the intense heat of a flamethrower, causing its surface to become transparent. Inside, creatures squirm, now visible through the clear exterior. Waiting patiently in the car nestled within the shadows of the woods, Helen and Jacob bide their time. She steps out of the car, following the boy as he ventures confidently into the darkness. Suddenly, they are both enveloped in a brilliant, blinding light. Both stand transfixed, staring in amazement as the sphere from the pool, now radiating with intense white brilliance, majestically ascends into the air.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: They sit in the car with the windscreen wipers rhythmically swishing back and forth and the headlights casting beams into the dim surroundings. He carefully opens the car door, steps out, and walks purposefully towards a nearby taxi. From the taxi, an elderly Chinese man is slowly emerging, assisted by a young man who is holding an umbrella to shield them from the elements. Inside the restaurant, the young man attentively brings a cup to the old man, who accepts it with a nod. The old man and Klaatu then sit down, facing each other across the table, while Helen and the old man's grandson occupy another table nearby. Helen's gaze is fixed on him, her eyes lingering before she lowers them, feeling the weight of the moment. Klaatu, in turn, studies the old man with an expressionless face, absorbing the atmosphere. Meanwhile, high metal panels are methodically pushed into place, forming a triangular wall around the robot, and a lid is carefully dropped on top, sealing it in. The Colonel, standing by, grins nervously, aware of the tension in the air. As night falls, police cars speed down a street, their sirens piercing the quiet. Helen is driving with determination towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a secluded wooded area, Klaatu steps out of the car, and Jacob, sitting inside, stares after him, his expression a mix of confusion and curiosity. Baffled, he looks out of the window, trying to make sense of the situation. Watched by Jacob, Helen exits the car and walks off, following Klaatu into the pitch-black darkness. She moves cautiously, her steps slow and deliberate, as she navigates through the obscurity. Suddenly, she cowers, instinctively covering her head as a swarm of insects buzzes around her. She continues on and eventually comes to a pond, where the surface of the water begins to bubble, and a mysterious light shines up from beneath. Hiding behind a tree, she watches in awe as a sphere, about 10 feet high, rises majestically to the surface of the pond. Within it, lights and dark mists swirl hypnotically, drawing in fish and other animals. A frog and a lizard leap eagerly into the water, heading towards the sphere. It drifts slowly towards the edge of the pond, and Klaatu approaches it with a sense of purpose. As he reaches out and touches it, light flares beneath his hand, sending ripples across the surface. Meanwhile, choppers circle another sphere in Central Park, their blades slicing through the air. In the middle of a desert, another sphere sits, and a burst of light shoots across its surface, attracting desert creatures like scorpions and snakes. Similarly, a burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle, captivating the wildlife. On a calm sea, a fishing boat sits quietly, and behind it, a vast sphere similar to the one in New York breaks the surface, its presence commanding attention. Klaatu stands by the pond sphere, staring intently into it, while Helen watches from a distance, observing his concentration as his hand rests on the sphere's surface. She then makes her way back to the car, her mind racing with the implications of what she has witnessed. She gets into the driver's seat and sits there, looking stunned, her eyes staring straight ahead as she processes the experience. Video footage shows people milling around a sphere in South America, their movements captured on screen. Another screen displays a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower, its surface becoming transparent and revealing creatures squirming inside. Back in the woods, Helen and Jacob wait in the car, the tension palpable. She eventually gets out and follows the boy as he ventures into the darkness. They are suddenly bathed in a brilliant light, and both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool, now blazing with white light, rises slowly into the air, leaving them in awe of the spectacle.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: They remain in the car with the windscreen wipers and headlights on. He exits and approaches a taxi, from which an elderly Chinese man and a young man with an umbrella emerge. Inside the restaurant, the young man serves a cup to the old man, who sits facing Klaatu, while Helen and his grandson sit at another table. Helen observes the men before lowering her eyes, as Klaatu studies the old man expressionlessly. Meanwhile, high metal panels form a triangular wall around the robot, topped with a lid, as the Colonel grins nervously. Police cars race down a street at night, while Helen drives towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a wooded area, Klaatu exits the car, and Jacob watches him leave. Helen follows Klaatu into the pitch-black darkness, moving slowly and shielding herself from swarming insects. She reaches a pond where the water bubbles and light emerges, revealing a 10-foot-high sphere. Hidden behind a tree, she observes as lights and dark mists swirl within, attracting fish and other animals. Klaatu approaches and touches the sphere, causing light to ripple across its surface. Choppers circle a sphere in Central Park, while another sphere in a desert attracts creatures with a burst of light. A similar sphere in a jungle emits light, and a vast sphere surfaces behind a fishing boat on a calm sea. Klaatu focuses on the pond sphere, with Helen watching from afar. She returns to the car, sits in the driver's seat, and stares ahead, stunned. Video footage shows people around a sphere in South America, and a screen displays a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower, revealing squirming creatures inside. Helen and Jacob wait in the car in the woods, then follow the boy into the darkness, where they are enveloped in brilliant light, watching in amazement as the pool sphere, glowing with white light, ascends into the air.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: They sit with the windscreen wipers and headlights still on, in a car parked near an upscale restaurant known for its traditional décor and exquisite menu. He gets out of the car and walks towards a taxi from which an elderly Chinese man, who once was a renowned scholar in his hometown, is emerging accompanied by a young man holding an umbrella to shield them from the rain. In the restaurant, filled with the aroma of freshly cooked dim sum, the young man brings a cup of fragrant green tea to the old man. The old man and Klaatu, whose expression is inscrutable, sit facing each other. Helen and his grandson are at another table, hesitant to interrupt their conversation. She stares at him, captivated yet curious. Helen looks at the men, then lowers her eyes, contemplating the significance of their meeting. Klaatu studies the old man expressionlessly, assessing the weight of his wisdom. High metal panels, used in military operations to contain sensitive equipment, are pushed into place forming a triangular wall around the robot. A lid, made of reinforced steel, is dropped in place on top. The Colonel grins nervously, aware of the tension in the room. Police cars speed down a street at night, their sirens echoing through the quiet neighborhoods. Helen is driving towards the Highlands, New Jersey, a serene area known for its scenic beauty and rugged landscapes. In a wooded area, where the canopy is dense and the air is filled with the scent of pine, Klaatu gets out of the car. Jacob stares after him, puzzling over the events unfolding. Baffled, he looks out of the window, trying to make sense of it all. Watched by Jacob, she walks off following Klaatu, drawn by an inexplicable need to understand his mission. It's pitch-black, the forest enveloping them in darkness. She moves slowly through the darkness, guided only by faint moonlight filtering through the trees. She cowers, covering her head, as insects swarm around her, disturbed by her presence. She comes to a pond, once part of a thriving ecosystem now eerily silent. The surface of the water begins to bubble and light shines up from beneath the surface, casting eerie reflections on the surrounding trees. Hiding behind a tree, she watches as a sphere about 10 feet high, reminiscent of ancient depictions of celestial orbs, rises to the surface of the pond. Lights and dark mists swirl within it, a mesmerizing dance of energy. Fish and other animals are attracted to it, drawn by its strange energy. A frog and a lizard leap into the water heading towards it, compelled by instinct. It drifts towards the edge of the pond, silently beckoning. Klaatu approaches it, his demeanor calm and determined. Light flares beneath his hand and ripples across the surface as he touches it, as if communicating with the sphere. Choppers circle the sphere in Central Park, a historic park in the heart of New York City, drawing curious onlookers. Another sphere sits in the middle of a desert, its presence there a stark contrast to the barren landscape. A burst of light shoots across the surface, illuminating the night. Desert creatures, scorpions and snakes, make their way towards it, undeterred by the light. A similar burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle, where the dense foliage vibrates with life. A fishing boat sits on a calm sea, its crew unaware of the vast sphere similar to the one in New York that breaks the surface behind it, disturbing the tranquility. Klaatu stares into the pond sphere, his thoughts unreadable. Helen watches from a distance as he concentrates, his hand resting on the sphere's surface. She makes her way back to the car, her mind racing with questions. She gets into the driver's seat and sits looking stunned, the gravity of the situation sinking in. She stares straight ahead, lost in thought. Video footage shows people milling around a sphere in South America, a continent rich with diverse cultures and history. A screen shows a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower, making the surface transparent, revealing creatures that squirm inside, a sight both terrifying and fascinating. Helen and Jacob wait in the car in the woods, the night air filled with anticipation. She gets out of the car and follows the boy as he heads into the darkness, where the unknown awaits. They're bathed in a brilliant light, an awe-inspiring phenomenon. Both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool, blazing with white light, rises slowly into the air, a celestial spectacle that transcends earthly understanding.

In a wooded area Klaatu gets out of the car. Jacob stares after him. Baffled he looks out of the window. Watched by Jacob she walks off following Klaatu. It is pitchblack. She moves slowly through the darkness. She cowers covering her head as insects swarm around her. She comes to a pond. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Fish and other animals are attracted to it. A frog and a lizard leap into the water heading towards it. It drifts towards the edge of the pond. Klaatu approaches it. Light flares beneath his hand and ripples across the surface as he touches it. Choppers circle the sphere in Central Park. Another sphere sits in the middle of a desert. A burst of light shoots across the surface. Desert creatures scorpions and snakes make their way towards it. A similar burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle. Helen watches from a distance as he concentrates his hand resting on the sphere's surface. She makes her way back to the car. She gets into the driver's seat and sits looking stunned. She stares straight ahead. Video footage shows people milling around a sphere. in South America. A screen shows a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower making the surface transparent. Creatures squirm inside. Helen and Jacob wait in the car in the woods. She gets out of the car and follows the boy as he heads into the darkness. They are bathed in a brilliant light. Both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool blazing with white light rises slowly into the air.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: They recline with the windscreen wipers and headlights still activated. He hops out of the car and strides towards a taxi from which an elderly Chinese man is descending accompanied by a young man brandishing an umbrella. In the restaurant, the young man slides a cup to the old man. The old man and Klaatu gaze at each other. Helen and his grandson are at another table. She glances at him. Helen observes the men, then raises her eyes. Klaatu examines the old man blankly. High metal panels are dragged into place forming a circular barrier around the robot. A lid is tossed in place on top. The Colonel smirks awkwardly. Police cars drift down a street at night. Helen is cruising towards the Highlands, New Jersey. In a wooded area, Klaatu climbs out of the car. Jacob glares after him. Confounded, he peers out of the window. Observed by Jacob, she strides off shadowing Klaatu. It's pitch-black. She advances slowly through the darkness. She crouches, shielding her head, as insects flit around her. She arrives at a pond. The surface of the water begins to ripple and light glimmers up from beneath the surface. Concealed behind a tree, she observes as a sphere about 10 feet high floats to the surface of the pond. Lights and dark mists churn within it. Fish and other animals are drawn to it. A frog and a lizard dive into the water aiming towards it. It glides towards the edge of the pond. Klaatu nears it. Light flashes beneath his hand and ripples scatter across the surface as he brushes it. Choppers hover around the sphere in Central Park. Another sphere rests in the middle of a desert. A beam of light flickers across the surface. Desert creatures, scorpions and snakes, slither their way towards it. A similar beam of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle. A fishing boat drifts on a calm sea. Behind it, a vast sphere similar to the one in New York emerges above the surface. Klaatu peers into the pond sphere. Helen watches from afar as he focuses, his hand placed on the sphere's surface. She returns back to the car. She slips into the driver's seat and sits looking astonished. She gazes straight ahead. Video footage shows people wandering around a sphere in South America. A screen shows a sphere being scorched with a flamethrower, rendering the surface translucent. Creatures squirm inside. Helen and Jacob linger in the car in the woods. She climbs out of the car and trails the boy as he ventures into the darkness. They're engulfed in a radiant light. Both gaze in wonder as the sphere from the pool, blazing with white light, ascends slowly into the air.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption

He twirls rapidly through the fog. He giggles, shielding his feet, as birds gather around him. He discovers a cave. The ceiling of the cavern starts to tremble and sound echoes down from above the ceiling. Retreating behind a bush, he listens as a cube about 20 feet wide sinks to the ceiling of the cave. Sounds and bright shadows cascade within it. Birds and other insects are drawn to it. A fox and a butterfly dive into the cavern aiming towards it. It glides towards the corner of the cave. Blarbo examines it. Sound booms beneath her foot and tremors across the ceiling as she pats it. Rockets orbit the cube in Liberty Plaza. Another cube rests in the corner of a field. A flash of sound zooms across the ceiling. Field critters, rabbits and mice, scramble their way towards it. A different flash of sound leaps out across the ceiling of a cube in a mountain. A carnival ride rests on a stormy lake. Beneath it, a tiny cube similar to the one in Tokyo rests below the ceiling. Blarbo glances into the cave cube. Edgar listens from a distance as she focuses, her foot hovering over the cube's ceiling. He skips his way back to the spaceship. He climbs into the co-pilot's chair and hovers looking confused. He squints back behind. Video tapes show cats wandering around a cube in Asia. A chalkboard shows a cube being doused with a hose, making the ceiling translucent. Insects giggle inside. Edgar and Carla wait in the spaceship near the jungle. He climbs out of the spaceship and skips after the cat as she dances into the fog. They're blinded in a faint sound. Both yawn in astonishment as the cube from the cavern, glowing with red sound, sinks swiftly into the clouds.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Klaatu exits a car and approaches a taxi with an elderly Chinese man and a young man with an umbrella. In a restaurant, Klaatu and the old man face each other, while Helen and the young man's grandson sit nearby. Helen observes Klaatu. Meanwhile, high metal panels form a wall around a robot, and the Colonel smiles nervously. Helen drives towards Highlands, New Jersey, and follows Klaatu into a wooded area. Insects swarm around her as she reaches a pond. A 10-foot sphere emerges, attracting animals. Klaatu touches it, and lights ripple across the surface. Similar spheres appear in Central Park, deserts, and jungles, attracting local wildlife. Klaatu focuses on the pond sphere as Helen watches. She returns to her car, stunned. Video footage shows people around a South American sphere, and another sphere is attacked with a flamethrower. Helen and Jacob in the woods are awed as the pool sphere rises, emitting a brilliant light.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Both stare in amazement as the sphere from the pool blazing with white light rises slowly into the air They're bathed in a brilliant light  She gets out of the car and follows the boy as he heads into the darkness  Helen and Jacob wait in the car in the woods  Creatures squirm inside  A screen shows a sphere being blasted with a flamethrower making the surface transparent fishing boat sits on a calm sea  A similar burst of light spreads out across the surface of a sphere in a jungle  Desert creatures scorpions and snakes make their way towards it  A burst of light
